DOC.brief_summary: This trial consist two part : A pilot study three-way cross trial determine high well tolerate dose Ritodrine ( Pre-Par® ) , impact Atosiban ( Tractocile® ) hemodynamics hence design final study . The final study plan three-way crossover trial investigate compare cardiovascular effect Ritodrine , Atosiban placebo relate effect pharmacokinetics Ritodrine Atosiban ( PK/PD model ) .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Tocolytical Medications Hemodynamics ( Central Peripheral ) Vascular Function Pilot Study Determine Design Final Study Final Study Itself
DOC.criteria: Age 20 40 year old ; In good health , especially cardiovascular disease , obstructive lung disease , chronic kidney disease diabetes mellitus . Using proper anticonception method ( orally , subcutaneously ) ; A negative pregnancy test . Intolerance Ritodrine ; On chronic medication , except oral subcutaneous contraception History present presentation cardiac arrythmias ; Risk pregnant less 6 month postpartum ; Giving breastfeeding ; Previous uteral surgery ; Using intrauteral device ( IUD ) ; A severe addiction : nicotine ( > 10 cigarettes/day ) , alcohol ( > 3 units/day ) , caffeine ( > 5 units/day ) extralegally drug .
